shows.title: Out of Iraq
shows.desc:
Celebrating Iraqi cuisine, you are advised to come hungry! Philip Juma, head chef and founder of JUMA Kitchen, will serve up his signature dishes using his family recipes with a contemporary touch. Saffron chicken and Iraqi dolma will be on show.

Philip Juma is the English-Irish-Iraqi head chef & founder of JUMA Kitchen, influenced by Middle Eastern and modern European cuisine.

Supported by Amal – A Saïd Foundation Programme
